events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund for the item as soon as possible.
The issue described by the customer matches conditions for a refund due to incorrect product delivery.
Assigning the refund request case to agent Sarah L. for handling and customer communication.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support, I’m here to assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, the order number is 874392 and I have attached a picture of the product showing that it is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should receive the amount back within 5 business days.
Thanks for handling this quickly, I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund being processed.
I have confirmed the refund has been authorized and is in progress. Please allow up to 5 days for it to reflect in your original payment method.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help with.
Since the refund was successfully processed and the customer confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this case now.
